scripts Package¶

scripts Package¶

lpad_run Module¶

A runnable script for managing a FireWorks database (a command-line interface to launchpad.py)

fireworks.scripts.lpad_run.lpad()¶
fireworks.scripts.lpad_run.parse_helper(lp, args, wf_mode=False, skip_pw=False)¶

Helper method to parse args that can take either id, name, state or query :param args: :return:

fireworks.scripts.lpad_run.pw_check(ids, args, skip_pw=False)¶

mlaunch_run Module¶

A runnable script to launch Job Packing (Multiple) Rockets

fireworks.scripts.mlaunch_run.mlaunch()¶

qlaunch_run Module¶

A runnable script for launching rockets (a command-line interface to queue_launcher.py)

fireworks.scripts.qlaunch_run.qlaunch()¶

rlaunch_run Module¶

A runnable script to launch a single Rocket (a command-line interface to rocket_launcher.py)

fireworks.scripts.rlaunch_run.rlaunch()¶
